articles.title: 4 marketing tricks to not fall for this holiday season - NPR
articles.description: Retailers use marketing techniques to get you to spend more, like creating a false sense of urgency or creating artificial discounts. Outsmart the gimmicks with these tips.
articles.content:
Extra 20% off! Factory sale! Last chance! You may have seen these offers while shopping. But are they actually good deals?
To find out, Life Kit spoke with Brian Vines
